sentences: Seda küsimust puudutavad näited on olulised.
Aruteljel puudutas peamine probleem sotsiaalseid norme.
Õdede vahelises vestluses puudutati isiklikke asju.
context: The Estonian word 'puudutab' is the third person singular form of the verb 'puudutama'. It means to touch, concern, relate to, or affect something. This verb indicates a connection between things - either physical contact (touch) or conceptual connection (relating to/concerning). In the provided dictionary definition example, it shows how this word can be used in contexts of discussing sensitive topics that 'concern intimate matters or love affairs'. The word implies some form of relevance or impact on the subject being discussed.
